name: A Magical Girl Crashed Through My Roof So We Went On An Adventure (or something like that)
name_original: A Magical Girl Crashed Through My Roof So We Went On An Adventure (or something like that)
description:
A girl is living alone in a cave in the middle of nowhere. Lost to everything. Suddenly, a magical girl crashed into her cave! So... What would you do if a magical girl crashed through your roof? Well, go on an adventure of course!

Created in about 10 days for the Magical Girl Game jam! I had a lot of fun making this, though it's a little unfinished. Missing some sounds etc. However I created it part-time while working on my final year dissertation at university.

I hope you enjoy!

Patch Log

  • Just a little patch which fixed a game-breaking bug.
